thread.section_title: New problems to Bromley Council on FixMyStreet
thread.title: Overhanging vegetation - dangerous prickly shrubs onto pathway, 20th February
thread.title_full: Overhanging vegetation - dangerous prickly shrubs onto pathway, 20th February

title: Overhanging vegetation - dangerous prickly shrubs onto pathway, 20th February
text:
Back to all reports
Overhanging vegetation - dangerous prickly shrubs onto pathway
Reported via mobile in the Overhanging Vegetation from private land category anonymously at 22:30 today
Sent to Bromley Council less than a minute later.
FixMyStreet ref: 7164998.
After waiting the 30 days you advised to do!! / you have removed the fence of the garden from the clarion property in front of my mothers house but the tree has collapsed where you only cut off a few branches which now is on the floor of the pathway! The whole of the other side of the fence is swinging into any persons face with the wind as you turn the corner to walk along to get in the front door of houses (numbers 4 - 12 Duddington Close); where the garden from that property is open and there is a dog, also a disgusting mattress, hanging over the public pathway from the garden where you removed half the fence - itâ€™s windy outside please can someone attend to make this safe
Updates
-
Thank you for your report, this is now being investigated. Information on our services and the timeframes we aim to respond in can be found:
http://www.bromley.gov.uk/ fixservicesState changed to: In progress
Posted by Bromley Council at 22:30 today
Provide an update
Your information will only be used in accordance with our privacy policy
